description: cmd/5l: make various structs smaller by reorder fields

messages.text: Could you please hg mail a fresh patchset for this CL.

hi dave, this cl is a work in progress.
i'm still experimenting now.

the current patch set reduces struct Sym by 4 bytes,
and it doesn't affect Reloc.

i'm still looking for ways to shrink struct Prog.
thanks for your patience.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6618056/diff/6001/src/cmd/5l/obj.c
File src/cmd/5l/obj.c (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6618056/diff/6001/src/cmd/5l/obj.c#newcode82
src/cmd/5l/obj.c:82: SIZEOF(Prog); SIZEOF(Sym); SIZEOF(Adr); SIZEOF(Reloc);
please comment this out.

subject: cmd/5l: make various structs smaller by reorder fields
